testcase.name: Golden Round - Start on Hole 10 (Back Nine) › complete back nine only (holes 10-18)
Golden Round - Random Hole Edits › complete round then edit random holes
testcase.system-out: Completing all 18 holes... All holes completed. Now editing random holes...
